name: Sunset IV
description:
Sunset Five Four

A message from GCJ Entertainment 1985

With the boom in arcade machines in the past few years, many less popular games have a small shelf life and are quickly being replaced. These games have a risk of being lost to history.

To combat this, now in 1985 G.C.J. Entertainment has decided to port four poorly received arcade games into a single cabinet, to be archived in computer museums around the world. This is what we call Operation Sunset IV.

Please enjoy this slice of history.

Controls

Since this is a port for a modern web browser, we had to map the original arcade controls to work with a computer keyboard.

  • Joystick up / left / down / right -> [W] / [A] / [S] / [D]
  • Action button -> [J]
  • Insert coin -> Warning, not yet implemented!
Credits

This game was made by Alex Tritt for the #NoticeMe game jam 2022.
